original_text: Joseph said to his brothers, “I am Joseph! Is my father still living?” But his brothers were not able to answer him, because they were terrified at his presence.
korean_text: 요셉이 그 형들에게 이르되 나는 요셉이라 내 아버지께서 아직 살아 계시니이까 형들이 그 앞에서 놀라서 대답하지 못하더라

sentences.original_text: But his brothers were not able to answer him
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그의 형들은 그에게 대답할 수 없었습니다

sentences.original_text: because they were terrified at his presence
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그의 앞에서 두려움에 떨었기 때문입니다
